Articles.Content:
After receiving a ton of hype on Facebook, this beauty is now being released here too!

Behold, the SS2 and WhiteKnightTwo!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The controls are pretty self-explanatory.

To get the full experience:

Follow the staging, detach the SS2 at any altitude you want, engage the engine 5 sec after detaching and pull up.

Try doing small rolls and yaws to wiggle your way up more easily. Don't worry if you don't pitch up instantly, wouldn't be too realistic anyway.

Go approx. 90deg up until fuel runs out or your choice.

Disable capsule torque, engage RCS, turn on chasecam and play around with the thrusters

After reentry, try to pitch up as hard as you can to get out of the nose-dive. Use capsule torque, RCS, everything and go into a steady glide for landing.
